game_description: The new type of Virtual Reality. EnvisionVR’s platform is changing the way off-the-plan projects are showcased and sold. By combining the world’s leading mobile VR and AR technology with powerful sales tools, the platform gives users absolute certainty in their future home. Key features: • 1:1 scale, be completely immersed in the design • Navigate by simply walking around or teleporting using the controllers or inbuilt room by room navigation • Access all digital marketing assets, renders, floor plans, 360 view, brochures and project information • See the real view, embed 4k drone footage into the experience • Compare floor plans and colour schemes seamlessly • Connect with other EnvisionVR platform users and communicate with in-built audio
